thread.title: Shooting reported near Linton Middle School in Penn HIlls
thread.title_full: Shooting reported near Linton Middle School in Penn HIlls

author: Pittsburgh Post-Gazette
title: Shooting reported near Linton Middle School in Penn HIlls
text:
Shooting reported near Linton Middle School in Penn HIlls March 28, 2017 5:10 PM Pittsburgh Post-Gazette 
Police responded Tuesday afternoon to a shooting near a Penn Hills middle school, officials said. 
The incident occurred about 4:30 p.m. near Linton Middle School on Maple-Lo Drive, Allegheny County emergency officials said. 
Penn Hills police Chief Howard Burton confirmed that there had been a shooting and said county homicide detectives were called to the scene. 
There was no active shooter, he said. BREAKING NEWS....#17-yr old reported shot in parking lot at Linton Middle School in Penn Hills. Eyewitness says it appears fatal.
